docs.snippet: The Board of Aldermen, Saturday evening, appropriated $500 each, to the Presidents of the Aldermen and Councilmen, for services as Health Commissioners. An appropriation passed to provide a drill-room for the new Thirty-seventh Regiment, State...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Aldermen, Saturday evening, appropriated $500 each, to the Presidents of the Aldermen and Councilmen, for services as Health Commissioners. An appropriation passed to provide a drill-room for the new Thirty-seventh Regiment, State Militia.

headline.main: MR. SEYMOUR FITZGERALD AT BURY; MR. FREDERICK PEEL AT BURY MR. H. BRAND AT LEWES MR. MILLER AT LEITH

docs.lead_paragraph: The annual show of fat stock, in connection with the Horsham market, took place in that town on the 11th, when an unusually large and creditable exhibition of stock took place. In the evening a dinner was held at the Black Horse, at which Mr. W.R. SEYMOUR FITZGERALD., M. P., presided.

headline.main: OUR HATTERAS INLET CORRESPONDENCE; WRETCHED CONDITION OF OUR TROOPS STRENGTHENING THE POSITION EXPECTED ATTACK BY THE REBELS, ETC.

docs.snippet: At the meeting of the Board, last evening, the usual appropriation of $500 was passed to compensate the Presidents of the Aldermen and Councilmen for services as Commissioners of Health.

headline.main: CITY AND COUNTY AFFAIRS.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. HEALTH COMMISSIONERS DRILL-ROOM FOR THE THIRTY-SEVENTH REGIMENT ELECTION SPORTS -THE RAILROAD BILL OF THE COUNCILMEN CONCURRED IN.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board, last evening, the usual appropriation of $500 was passed to compensate the Presidents of the Aldermen and Councilmen for services as Commissioners of Health.

docs.lead_paragraph: CORONERS' INQUESTS. Coroner SCHIRMER on Friday held an inquest on the body of MARY E. WALLACE, a child aged 6 years, who died from burns accidentally received on Christmas day, at No. 326 West Forty-seventh-street....An unknown man was found dead in the upper part of a building on the corner of Catharine-slip and South-street, Friday afternoon. The cause of his death is believed to have been intemperance. The Coroner was Dotified....A child...
